categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Longshot" was the nickname of a clone trooper who served under Commander Cody during the Clone Wars. Around 21 BBY, Longshot was part of the team to rescue Jedi Master Even Piell, who was being held captive in a prison by the Confederacy. He was killed in the Citadel when an electrified wall closed in on the rescue team, electrocuting him.
As a clone of Jango Fett Longshot stood at 1.83 Imperial standard meter.
Longshot utilized white Phase I clone trooper armor and a standard DC-15S.
In the episode, Longshot was voiced by Dee Bradley Baker, who voices all clone troopers through the series.
